intro.description: After a successful 15-year career in logistics, I pivoted to web development, a field I am deeply passionate about. I find joy in creating and innovating on the web. My recent focus has been on JavaScript frameworks like React and Next.js, leveraging my skills to build responsive and impactful web applications.

footer.tech: built with React & Next.js (App Router & Server Actions), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.
